name: Cobolcarig Laboratories
description:
Cobolcarig Laboratories is the leading purveyor of magical and mechanical devices in the realm, so when they failed to produce Duke Tarnham’s latest commission, he sent servants to investigate at once. They haven’t reported back. Now the duke has turned to adventurers to investigate this uncharacteristic silence.

This pamphlet adventure is designed to be run in a single session. It is compatible with any OSR system.
